easy.q: I have a face and two hands but no arms or legs. I tell you when to start and stop. What am I?
easy.hint: Look at time pieces on the wall

medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be. What word am I?
medium.hint: Think small quantity and letter trick

hard.q: Turn me on my side and I will rise. Turn me over and I will fall. What am I?
hard.hint: Time flow, gravity, and shape puzzle
